title: Tearful Rebekah Vardy 'begged Coleen Rooney in panicked phone call over leaks'
text:

Rebekah Vardy was reportedly in tears when she called fellow WAG Coleen Rooney after being accused of leaking stories to the press.

The 37-year-old wife of England footballer Jamie Vardy, is believed to have begged Wayne Rooney's wife to realise that she wasn't the source of the leak.

Coleen, 33, had apparently 'set a trap' for Rebekah by posting 'fake news' on her Instagram page and the blocking all her friends apart from Vardy, to prove that she was the source of leaks to The Sun .

A source has told the paper that Rebekah 'begged Coleen to believe' it wasn't her but in a call to her former friend "she pleaded but was rebuffed."

(Image: AFP/Getty Images)

(Image: LightRocket via Getty Images)

Coleen sent social media into meltdown on Wednesday morning when she revealed that she had "proof" that Rebekah was the mole.

She published a statement online, in which she pointed the finger at Rebekah and said she had "got to the bottom" of a problem that dogged her for "a few years now."

Once she was satisfied she had enough “proof” she went online to publicly accuse Becky, 37 — sending social media into a meltdown.

(Image: Dave J Hogan/Getty Images)

Coleen told yesterday morning how she had finally “got to the bottom” of a problem troubling her for “a few years now”.

Rebekah hit back saying that Coleen was "disgusting" for going public with her findings without speaking to her first.

A source told The Sun that Rebekah "was really upset and pleaded with Coleen to believe she hasn’t gone behind her back."

(Image: Getty Images)

They said that she wanted to "smooth things over in the friendliest way possible," and wanted "Coleen to see it from her point of view by staying calm."

After speaking to Coleen, Rebekah "was furious about how she’d attempted to call her out publicly without speaking to her."

The unseemly allegations has meant that the pair "will never be friends again."

description: Rebekah Vardy was outed as the culprit of leaking stories about Coleen Rooney to the press but she has refuted all the claims
